item.title: My First Post
item.author: sam.sumitkumar@gmail.com (Sumit Kumar)
item.description: This is heading 1 Hello world! You’re online now!! yo yo. what’s up boo! :card_index_dividers:what the shit! ðŸ‘‡ I’m not sure how long of a text is kept from the body to the front page for previews. {{ $related := .Site.RegularPages.Related . }} ðŸ‘† So, probably I should keep writing and see if it cuts down at some point. Hopefully it does otherwise the page would have bombardment of text.
